com.tumblr.backboard.performer

Class Performer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tumblr.backboard.performer.Performer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.facebook.rebound.SpringListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapPerformer

    public class Performer
extends Object
implements com.facebook.rebound.SpringListener
    Directly maps the motion of a Spring to a Property on a View.

    Created by ericleong on 5/19/14.
